title: Unveiling Corporate Practices: A Detailed FOIA Inquiry into Roivant Sciences

communications.communication:
Jordan Lassiter
Email: Jordan@Lassiter.eu
January 10th, 2024

Securities and Exchange Commission
FOIA/PA Office
100 F Street, NE
Washington, DC 20549
Email: FOIA@sec.gov


ATTENTION: DETAILED REQUEST FOR RECORDS UNDER FOIA

Dear FOIA Officer,

I am submitting this request under the Freedom of Information Act (5 U.S.C. § 552) for records related to Roivant Sciences. This request is prepared with precise detail to ensure thorough understanding and compliance.

Requester: Jordan Lassiter, Jordan@Lassiter.eu

Subject: Request for SEC Records on Roivant Sciences

Specific Records Requested:

Financial and Audit Reports: Financial statements, audit reports, and compliance documents of Roivant Sciences for the last five years.
SEC Filings and Disclosures: All SEC filings including Form 10-K, Form 10-Q, and other relevant disclosures by Roivant Sciences.
Investigation and Enforcement Records: Any records of investigations, enforcement actions, or penalties involving Roivant Sciences.
Communication Records: Correspondence between the SEC and Roivant Sciences on compliance, regulatory inquiries, or investigations.
Whistleblower Complaints: Records of whistleblower complaints against Roivant Sciences, along with any SEC responses or actions taken.
Legal Basis and Rationale:

Public Interest & Transparency: Access to information about Roivant Sciences is crucial for public knowledge regarding corporate practices and regulatory compliance.
Accountability: These records are essential for understanding SEC oversight and corporate governance.
Fees and Costs:

Fee Waiver Request: Attached is a Fee Waiver Request Letter, citing public interest grounds.
Cost Limitation: Notification requested if costs exceed $200, with an itemized cost breakdown.
Enclosures: Fee Waiver Request Letter (Fee_Waiver_Letter_copy_1.pdf).

Intended Use of Information:
For public interest relating to corporate governance and regulatory adherence of Roivant Sciences, not for commercial purposes.

Acknowledgment Requested:
Kindly acknowledge this request and provide a tracking number.

This FOIA request is made with the expectation of a complete and timely response in line with the requirements of federal law.

Sincerely,

Jordan Lassiter
